text: Ghotki railway station (, ) is located in Ghotki town, Ghotki district of Sindh province, Pakistan. ==See also== * Ghotki rail crash * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Ghotki District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Ghotki railway station
